name.title: Impact Bond Name
name.description:
Full name of the Social Impact Bond. What counts as an Impact Bond project? It is a contractual relationship that includes two core factors:
• Payment for social or environmental outcomes achieved
• Up-front repayable finance provided by a third party, the repayment of which is (at least partially) conditional on achieving specified outcomes.

Each impact bond project that begins work under a new contract, with a new target cohort, a distinct geography, and/or with a later start date is counted separately.

alternative_names.title: Alternative Names
alternative_names.description: Additional or informal names should be specified in this variable. If the project has more than one alternative name, they should be separated by commas.

stage_development.title: Stage of Development
stage_development.description: Latest known stage of development of the project.

value.title: (Value)
value.description: Codelist options are: Contracted (A project falls under the category of ‘contracted’ when key stakeholders have signed a contract but service provision has not started yet), Implementation (A project falls under the category of ‘implementation’ when service provision has started.), Service delivery complete (A project falls under the category of ‘complete service delivery’ when service provision has finished) or Complete (A project falls under the category of ‘complete’ when service provision has finished, and all outcome payments have been made)

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Source of information for stage of development.

value.title: (Value)
value.description: If the project has a ‘YES’ in this variable, it has data for the Social Investment Prototype tabs.

outcomes_contract_signed.title: Date outcomes contract signed
outcomes_contract_signed.description: Date on which the outcomes contract was signed. If signed by parties on different dates, select the latest date of signature.

contracts_between_all_parties_signed.title: Date contracts between all parties signed
contracts_between_all_parties_signed.description: The date on which the full set of required contracts between impact bonds parties received sign off. That is the date – whichever is the later – on which parties signed the outcomes contract; service delivery contract; investment contract or any other contract signalling the agreement to the impact bond arrangement such that full contracting arrangements are signed.

anticipated_completion_date.title: Anticipated completion date
anticipated_completion_date.description: Expected date when final outcomes payments will be made.

actual_completion_date.title: Actual completion date
actual_completion_date.description: Actual date when final outcomes payments were made.

start_date_of_service_provision.title: Start date of service provision
start_date_of_service_provision.description: Date when service provision started/will start.

anticipated_end_date_of_service_provisio.title: Anticipated end date of service provision
anticipated_end_date_of_service_provisio.description: Expected date when service provision will end.

actual_end_date_of_service_provision.title: Actual end date of service provision
actual_end_date_of_service_provision.description: Actual date when service provision ended/will end.

notes.title: (Notes)
notes.description: Notes on key dates of the project.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: Project jurisdiction describes a project’s origins, using the place it is governed or organised from, under law, as a proxy.

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Source of information for jurisdiction.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which financial data is reported for this project.

min.title: Min
min.description: Some projects do not have an exact figure for investment commitment at the beginning of implementation. Some projects can access further capital as the project moves forward. In these cases, projects can share a range of minimum and maximum values of investment commitment. This variable captures the lower value of the range in the currency of the project.

exact.title: Exact
exact.description: Total investment amount committed by investors (upfront capital raised), as contractually agreed. Note that this should not include any recycled outcome payments.

max.title: Max
max.description: Some projects do not have an exact figure for investment commitment at the beginning of implementation. Some projects can access further capital as the project moves forward. In these cases, projects can share a range of minimum and maximum values of investment commitment. This variable captures the higher value of the range in the currency of the project.

min.title: Min
min.description: Minimum investment amount in US dollars.

exact.title: Exact
exact.description: Exact investment amount in US dollars.

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum investment amount in US dollars.

maximum_potential_outcome_payment_v2.title: Maximum potential outcome payment
maximum_potential_outcome_payment_v2.description: Currency in which maximum potential outcome payments are reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total maximum payments for outcomes from outcome funders. This should be equal to “contract cap”.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Total maximum payments for outcomes from outcome funders in US dollars.

maximum_potential_loss.title: Maximum potential loss
maximum_potential_loss.description: Percentage of principal that investors stand to lose in a worst-case scenario. Please provide for each investor, if different.

maximum_potential_return_type.title: Maximum potential return type
maximum_potential_return_type.description: This variable identifies whether the return is average annual return or IRR (Internal rate of return).

maximum_potential_return.title: Maximum potential return
maximum_potential_return.description: Percentage return that investors expect to gain in best case scenario. Return can be understood as the profit on an investment. This is typically the ratio of the income from the investment over the cost of the investment. Please provide for each investor, if different.

configuration_contracting_parties.title: Configuration of the Contracting Parties
configuration_contracting_parties.description: A description of the bilateral or multilateral relationship between contracting parties. It identifies which party/parties hold the contract with the outcome funder (or which actor has majority control of a contract-holding Special Purpose Vehicle). This variable does not have a codelist, but these are some suggested options: Managed structure (bilateral outcomes contract between outcomes payer and intermediary organisation or intermediary-owned SPV), Intermediated structure (bilateral outcomes contract between outcomes payer and investor organisation, or investor-owned SPV), Direct structure (bilateral outcomes contract between outcomes payer and service provider or service provider-owned SPV), Framework structure (multilateral contract where multiple parties – provider, investor and/or intermediary – are all direct parties to the same outcomes contract with the outcome payer).

investor_repayment.title: Investor repayment
investor_repayment.description: To be completed at the end of the project. Extent to which investment and return was paid to investor. Suggested options are: no repayment (no principal or return), some repayment (but below value of principal), principal repaid (but no net return), principal and postivie net financial returns or not publicly available.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which outcome payments data is reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total actual payments for outcomes disbursed by outcome payers.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: To be completed at the end of the project. Total actual payments for outcomes disbursed by outcome payers in US dollars.

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Source of information for financial and outcomes payments data.

notes.title: (Notes)
notes.description: Notes on financial and outcomes payments data.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which investment details are reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The total amount of funds invested up to date.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Total amount of funds invested up to date in USD. The GO Lab team does the conversion using the exchange rates provided by the World Bank. [Note that this variable does not capture and may misrepresent fluctuations over different years. This is an issue being tackled in the prototyping process.]

date.title: Date
date.description: Latest date for which investment details are reported.

target.title: Target
target.description: The targeted rate of return of an investment on the project, after all costs have been considered, to determine profitability (this value should be equal to net IRR).

latest.title: Latest
latest.description: The latest actual rate of return of an investment on the project after all costs have been considered, to determine profitability. Reported as date below. If actual IRR is not being reported seek to indicate if Actual IRR exceeds Target IRR (yes/no).

date.title: Date
date.description: Latest date for which actual/latest internal rate of return is reported.

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Sources of information about investment details.

social_challenge.title: Social challenge
social_challenge.description: Broad definition of the social challenges that the project aims to address.

intervention.title: Intervention
intervention.description: Description of the intervention supported by the Impact Bond.

policy_sector.title: Policy sector
policy_sector.description: Main policy sector in which the project is based.

primary_sdg_goal.title: Primary SDG goal
primary_sdg_goal.description: Primary Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) in which the project is based. To be selected from the 17 SDGs defined in the United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015) https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda. [This is at the project level. This is also captured at the outcome level]

secondary_sdg_goals.title: Secondary SDG goals
secondary_sdg_goals.description: Secondary Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) in which the project is based. Primary SDG Goal must not be included in this variable. [This is at the project level. This is also captured at the outcome level]

primary_sdg_target.title: Primary SDG target
primary_sdg_target.description: This variable identifies what primary SGD target the project is addressing. See United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015)  https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda. [This is at the project level. This is also captured at the outcome level]

secondary_sdg_targets.title: Secondary SDG targets
secondary_sdg_targets.description: This variable identifies what secondary SGD target the project is addressing. Primary SDG target must not be included in this variable. See United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015)  https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda. [This is at the project level. This is also captured at the outcome level]

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Source of information for purpose and classifications data.

notes.title: (Notes)
notes.description: Notes on purpose and classifications of this project.

target_population.title: Target population
target_population.description: Description of the population targeted by the project and any eligibility requirement for the cohort of people who are to be offered support.

targeted_number_service_users_or_benefic.title: Targeted number of unique service users or beneficiaries (total)
targeted_number_service_users_or_benefic.description: Intended number of individuals in the target population who will be engaged in the service/intervention and/or whose social outcomes will be evaluated for outcome contract payment calculation.

unit_type_targeted_service_users_or_bene.title: Unit type of targeted service users or beneficiaries
unit_type_targeted_service_users_or_bene.description: Description of the unit of measurement that is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries.

unit_description_of_service_user_or_bene.title: Unit description of targeted service user or beneficiaries
unit_description_of_service_user_or_bene.description: This field will only be completed if the answer to the last variable was “other”. This variable identifies what type of unit of measurement is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries. Examples of other units of measurements could be families, villages, etc.

actual_number_service_users_or_beneficia.title: Actual number of unique service users or beneficiaries engaged (total)
actual_number_service_users_or_beneficia.description: To be completed at the end of the project or when service delivery is complete. Effective number of service users after the project was completed. The actual number of service users may differ from the targeted number, as forecasted at the beginnings of the project.

unit_type_actual_service_users_or_benefi.title: Unit type of actual service users or beneficiaries engaged

value.title: (Value)
value.description: To be completed at the end of the project or when service delivery is complete. Description of the unit of measurement that is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries. Codelist options are.

unit_description_of_actual_service_user_.title: Unit description of actual service user or beneficiaries engaged
unit_description_of_actual_service_user_.description: To be completed at the end of the project. This field will only be completed if the answer to the last variable was “other”. This variable identifies what type of unit of measurement is used to account for actual number of service users or beneficiaries. Examples of other unit of measurements could be families, villages, etc.

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Source of information for service users' data.

changes_to_project_due_to_covid19.title: Changes to project due to COVID-19

value.title: (Value)
enum: Continue on outcomes contract without variations
Continue on outcomes contract with variations
Switch to grant payments based on medium scenarios

source_ids.title: (Source ID's)
source_ids.description: Source of information for COVID-19 changes in projects.

id.title: Id
id.description: This variable captures the INDIGO unique identifier for outcomes funds. These identifiers are defined in the Outcomes Fund Dataset and taken from there.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about Outcomes Funds.

service_provision_id.title: Service Provision ID
service_provision_id.description: The GO Lab team gives an identifier to the different service deliveries that are supported by the same impact bond project. For instance, if a project is providing a service in two different cities, the first service would be identified as ‘servicedelivery1’ and the second one would be ‘servicedelivery2’.

location_name.title: Location - Name
location_name.description: Name of the city or region where services are provided.

location_postcode.title: Location - Postcode
location_postcode.description: Postal code of the location where services are provided.

location_country.title: Location - Country
location_country.description: Country where services are provided. Countries must be expressed using the ISO 3166 codelist, which contains a 2-character country code for every country (Eg: GB, US, etc.).

lat_lng.title: Lat/Lng
lat_lng.description: Latitude and longitude coordinates. GO Lab will add or double check this variable. This variable feeds into the map(s) on the GO Lab website.

lat.title: Lat
lat.description: Latitude coordinates must be expressed in decimals (degrees will not work). The GO Lab team will add or double check this variable. This variable feeds into the map(s) on the GO Lab website.

lng.title: Lng
lng.description: Longitude coordinates must be expressed in decimals (degrees will not work). The GO Lab team will add or double check this variable. This variable feeds into the map(s) on the GO Lab website.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about delivery locations.

id.title: Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet. The GO Lab team will enumerate sources using names such as ‘source1’, ‘source2’, ‘source3’.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the person or institution who shared information about this project.

publishing_organisation_ids.title: Publishing Organisations
publishing_organisation_ids.description: Organisation that published the evaluation, report or website (etc.) that is cited as a source. If there are many organisations jointly publishing a document, they should all be separated by commas.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of the document about this project, if there is one.

archive_url.title: Archive URL
archive_url.description: A preserved copy of an online source that can be accessed if the original page is moved, changes, or disappears.

publication_date.title: Publication Date
publication_date.description: Date when the information about this project was published.

accessed_date.title: Accessed Date
accessed_date.description: Date when the information about this project was accessed.

id.title: Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifiers to be referenced in another sheet. This will be set by the GO Lab team. These names could be ‘serviceprovider1’, ‘serviceprovider2’, etc.

organisation_id.description: INDIGO identifier of the organisation that provides services for this impact bond project. See INDIGO Identifiers section.

intervention.title: Intervention
intervention.description: Description of the intervention or the activities that service providers are funded to address the social challenge.

start_date.title: Start
start_date.description: Expected date when service delivery starts.

end_date.title: End
end_date.description: Expected date when service delivery ends.

start_date.title: Start
start_date.description: Actual date when service delivery starts.

end_date.title: End
end_date.description: Actual date when service delivery ends.

description.title: Description
description.description: This variable specifies whether there has been a modification in the service delivery. Where there are multiple alterations, this field should describe all alterations that have taken place.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: This variable presents the motivation for that modification, if applicable. Where there are multiple alterations, this field should describe the reason for all alterations that have taken place.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about service provision.

organisation_id.description: INDIGO identifier of the organisation that pays for social outcomes in this impact bond project. See INDIGO Identifiers section.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Total maximum payments for outcomes from each outcome payer. Currency.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total maximum payments for outcomes from each outcome payer.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Total maximum payments for outcomes from each outcome payer in US dollars.

result_type.title: Result type
result_type.description: This variable specifies whether a result is interim or over all (final). Codelist options are: Interim (interim or intermediate results can be shared specifying details of the duration of the performance period - for instance, ‘outcomes achieved during year 1’) or Overall (overall results are achieved when the project is finished).

start_date.title: Start
start_date.description: This variable provides the start date of the performance period.

end_date.title: End
end_date.description: This variable provides the end date of the performance period.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which outcome payments are reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total actual payments for outcomes disbursed by outcome payers at the moment of data collection in relevant currency.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Total actual payments for outcomes disbursed by outcome payers in USD.

description.title: Description
description.description: Detail of the modifications to payment commitments occurred during the life of the impact bond project.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Brief explanation of the reasons behind the modifications to payment commitments occurred during the life of the impact bond project.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about outcome payments.

id.title: Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifiers to be referenced in another sheet. This will be set by the GO Lab team. These names could be ‘investment1’, ‘investment2’, etc.

organisation_id.description: INDIGO identifier for the organisation that invested upfront capital for this project. See INDIGO Identifiers section.

value.title: (Value)
enum: High Net Worth Individual/Family Office/Private Bank

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which investments are reported for this project.

min.title: Min
min.description: When it is not possible to share exact amounts, projects can share a range with minimum and maximum amount of investment committed by each investor. This variable captures the lower value in the range.

exact.title: Exact
exact.description: Exact amount of committed investment from each investor in relevant currency.

max.title: Max
max.description: When it is not possible to share exact amounts, projects can share a range with minimum and maximum amount of investment committed by each investor. This variable captures the higher value in the range.

min.title: Min
min.description: Minimum amount of investment committed by each investor in USD (when it is not possible to have exact amount in USD).

exact.title: Exact
exact.description: Exact amount of investment committed by each investor in USD.

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum amount of investment committed by each investor in USD (when it is not possible to have exact amount in USD).

maximum_potential_loss.description: Percentage of principal that investors stand to lose in a worst-case scenario.

maximum_potential_return_type.title: Maximum Potential Return Type
maximum_potential_return_type.description: This variable specifies whether the maximum potential return type is measured as average annual return or IRR.

maximum_potential_return.title: Maximum Potential Return
maximum_potential_return.description: Percentage return that investors stand to gain in best case scenario.

investor_repayment.title: Investor Repayment
investor_repayment.description: Extent to which investment and return was paid to investor.

value.title: (Value)
enum: Some repayment (but below value of principle)

investment_type.title: Investment Type
investment_type.description: This variable identifies whether this investment qualifies as debt, equity or a combination of both.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about investments.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes on investment amounts or investors.

organisation_id.title: Organisation ID
organisation_id.description: INDIGO identifier for the organisation that provides intermediary services for this project. See INDIGO Identifiers section.

organisation_role_category.title: Organisation Role Category
organisation_role_category.description: The role(s) or key functions performed by each of the named intermediaries.

other_role_description.title: Other Role Description
other_role_description.description: If an organization is providing a role that is not listed above, it can be listed in this field.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about intermediary organisations.

id.title: Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifiers to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by the GO Lab team. These identifiers could be ‘outcomemetric1’, ‘outcomemetric2’, etc.

definition.title: Outcome Definition
definition.description: The outcome is what changes for an individual as the result of a service or intervention. Example of outcomes include ‘access to a formal job’, ‘improve learning at school’, ‘improve access to health services’, etc.

target_population.title: Target Population
target_population.description: Description of the targeted population of beneficiaries or service users that are intended to achieve pre-arranged social outcomes.

targeted_number_of_service_users_or_bene.title: Targeted number of service users Or beneficiaries (total)
targeted_number_of_service_users_or_bene.description: Targeted number of beneficiaries/service users for each outcome metric

unit_type_of_targeted_service_users_or_b.title: Unit type of targeted Service users or beneficiaries
unit_type_of_targeted_service_users_or_b.description: Description of the unit of measurement that is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries.

unit_description_of_service_user_or_bene.title: Unit description of Service user or beneficiaries
unit_description_of_service_user_or_bene.description: This field will only be completed if the answer to the last variable was “other”. This variable identifies what type of unit of measurement is used to account for targeted service users or beneficiaries.

outcome_metric_target.title: Outcome metric target
outcome_metric_target.description: An outcome metric target is the specific value attached to the measure of outcomes for the purposes of determining whether satisfactory performance has been achieved. In an impact bond, these targets will usually determine whether a payment is made to the provider or investor. This variable provides a detailed description of the metric(s) used to determine payments from the outcome payers. It should provide a clear definition of the conditions under which an outcome is agreed to have been ‘achieved’ or ‘not achieved’.

other_target_for_meeting_outcome_metric_.title: Other target for Meeting outcome metric target
other_target_for_meeting_outcome_metric_.description: This variable identifies information about other/secondary targets that need to be met in order to achieve the outcome.

outcome_validation_method.title: Outcome validation Method
outcome_validation_method.description: The approach taken to assessing whether the specified outcomes have been achieved and the basis on which ‘outcome payments’ will be made. This could take the form of validated administrative data (for example in a rate card for youth engagement where young people achieve education outcomes, the production of these qualifications may be used as the basis of outcome payments) or a formal and independent impact evaluation (for example under a Randomised Control Trial or quasi-experimental study outcome payments are only made when the performance of the treatment group is significantly improved when compared to the control group). To be selected from: Randomised Control Trial; Quasi-experimental study; Historical comparison (e.g. comparison to historical benchmark); Pre-Post analysis  (measurement of outcomes for target individual or  cohort before and after intervention); Simple ex-post verification; Not available.

data_source_for_outcome_validation.title: Data source for Outcome validation
data_source_for_outcome_validation.description: The sources of information for outcome validation could be existing administrative data or new data collected.

policy_sector.title: Policy sector
policy_sector.description: Main policy sector in which the outcome metric is based.

primary_sdg_goal.title: Primary SDG goal
primary_sdg_goal.description: Primary Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) in which the project is based. To be selected from the 17 SDGs defined in the United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015) https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda.

secondary_sdg_goals.title: Secondary SDG goals
secondary_sdg_goals.description: Secondary Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) in which the project is based. Primary SDG Goal must not be included in this variable.

primary_sdg_target.title: Primary SDG target
primary_sdg_target.description: This variable identifies what primary SGD target the project is addressing. See United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015)  https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda.

secondary_sdg_targets.title: Secondary SDG targets
secondary_sdg_targets.description: This variable identifies what secondary SGD target the project is addressing. Primary SDG target must not be included in this variable. See United Nations 2030 Agenda (2015)  https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about outcome metrics.

outcome_metric_id.title: Outcome Metric Id
outcome_metric_id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by the GO Lab analyst. This ID should be equal to the ID that was stated in the “Results” and “Outcome metrics” sections.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which outcome pricing data is reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Price per unit, often a participant, for whom outcomes are achieved. Price here is the cost to the outcome payer. The unit should be equal to the unit of measurement in the ‘Service and beneficiaries’ part of the General Overview tab (eg: individuals, families, villages, etc.). This is to be populated only if there is a single outcome which is measured at the unit/individual level.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Price per unit, often a participant, for whom outcomes are achieved in USD. Price here is the cost to the outcome payer.

maximum_price_if_all_targets_achieved.title: Maximum Price if all targets achieved

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Maximum price if all targets related to that outcome are achieved.

contracted_increases_to_outcome_pricing.title: Contracted increases to outcome pricing
contracted_increases_to_outcome_pricing.description: If certain price increases have been contracted (e.g. inflation adjustments), an description of these terms should be provided.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about outcome pricing.

investment_id.title: Investment Id
investment_id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet.

outcome_metric_id.title: Outcome Metric Id
outcome_metric_id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet.

sending_organisation_id.title: Sending Organisation ID
sending_organisation_id.description: INDIGO unique ID of the organisation that makes the transaction.

receiving_organisation_id.title: Receiving Organisation ID
receiving_organisation_id.description: INDIGO unique ID of the organisation that receives the transaction.

transaction_type.title: Transaction Type
transaction_type.description: This variable specifies whether the transaction is a debt or repayment of debt, equity, payment for an outcome or other type of transaction.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which transaction data is reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Total amount of the transaction in relevant currency.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Total amount of the transaction in USD. The GO Lab team does the conversion using the exchange rates provided by the World Bank.

id.title: Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifiers to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by any analyst. These identifiers could be ‘technicalassistance1’, ‘technicalassistance2’, etc.

title.title: Title
title.description: A summary name for this element of TA. Note that each project may have multiple elements of TA. TA may be broken into different elements as necessary to allow the category, cost and/or other variables to be completed.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of this element of TA.

period_start.title: Period Start
period_start.description: Date when this specific element of TA starts

period_end.title: Period End
period_end.description: Date when this specific element of TA finishes.

funding_organisation_id.title: Funding Organisation Id
funding_organisation_id.description: Id of the organization that pays for technical assistance.

recipient_organisation_id.title: Recipient Organisation Id
recipient_organisation_id.description: Id of the organization that receives technical assistance.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which costs of TA are described.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Sources of information about technical assistance to this project.

technical_assistance_id.title: Technical Assistance Id
technical_assistance_id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet.

title.title: Title
title.description: A summary name for this element of TA.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this element of TA.

category.title: Category
category.description: This variable has a long list of options. TA should be broken into elements and one item from the list be selected for each element.

value.title: (Value)
enum: Overall TA - Delivery - SPO Staff Member
Theory of Change and Impact Strategy - Support to develop the Theory of Change and Impact Strategy
Theory of Change and Impact Strategy - Support to develop an evaluation framework and performance measures
Fundraising - Assistance securing funding from other sources
Fundraising - Use VPO's reputation to help grantees secure funding from other sources
Revenue Strategy - Business Model Development or Business Model Canvas)
Financial Management - Sound Financial Management Capabilities or Financial Management Tools
Financial Management - Financial Planning or Accounting
Financial Management - Support To Establish New Financial Systems
Human Capital Support - Strengthening CEO And Management Team (Coaching And Mentoring
Human Capital Support - Recruitment And Talent Provision
Governance Support - Support to Develop Board of Directors
Governance Support - Advice or Assistance to Strengthen the Board or Governance System
Governance Support - Board Development or Governance Assistance
Governance Support - Assistance in Recruitment of New Board Members
Strategic Support - Support to Develop the Business Strategy
Strategic Support - Support to Develop New Products or Services
Strategic Support - Support to Develop New Business Systems or Procedures
Strategic Support - Advice on management of change
Operational Support - Technical Assistance in Specialist Areas
Operational Support - Estate Management or Access to Physical Space
Funding - Financing Capacity Building Grants and Awards - Specific money allocated for non-financial support
Funding - Financing Capacity Building Grants and Awards - VPOs and VPO’s funders allocate specific resources to non-financial support
Funding - Financing Unrestricted Grants or Funding - Give unrestricted funding for capacity building
Funding - Financing Unrestricted Grants or Funding - VPOs and VPO’s funders allocate specific resources to non-financial support/external donations
Funding - Financing Grants and Contacts with External Capacity-building Providers - Develop Network of Capacity-building Providers
Funding - Financing Grants and Contacts with External Capacity-building Providers - External Parties Giving Support For Free
Funding - Financing Capacity Building Through Collaboration Among Funders And Beyond - Investors Team Up To Address Capacity-building Challenges
Funding - Financing Capacity Building Through Collaboration Among Funders And Beyond - VPOs and VPO’s Funders Allocate Specific Resources to Non-financial Support
Funding - Financing the SPO to Pay for Non-financial Support or Matching

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: This variable captures different approaches in which a social investor can deliver TA.

value.title: (Value)
enum: Informal Relationship Management and Ad Hoc Support

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Cost of Technical Assistance activities in relevant currency.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Cost of Technical Assistance activities in USD. The GO Lab team does the conversion using the exchange rates provided by the World Bank.

number_of_days.title: Number of Days
number_of_days.description: Cost of Technical Assistance activities in days of work.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Sources of information about technical assistance details.

outcome_metric_id.title: Outcome Metric Id
outcome_metric_id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by the GO Lab team. This ID should be equal to the ID that was stated in the “Results” and “Outcome metrics” sections. These identifiers could be ‘outcomemetric1’, ‘outcomemetric2’, etc.

result_level.title: Result level
result_level.description: This variable specifies whether a result was captured at the outcome level or project level.

result_type.title: Result type
result_type.description: This variable specifies whether a result is interim or final. Interim results are reported when the GO Lab receives data from live projects. Final results are reported when the GO Lab receives the final data for complete projects.

start_date.title: Start
start_date.description: This variable provides the start date of the performance period.

end_date.title: End
end_date.description: This variable provides the end date of the performance period.

outcomes_achieved.title: Outcomes achieved
outcomes_achieved.description: A description of the outcomes that were achieved, according to the specifications of the contract. This description can be similar to the description of outcome metrics in the ‘Outcome metric’ tab.

number_engaged_in_impact_bond.title: Number engaged In impact bond
number_engaged_in_impact_bond.description: Number of users or beneficiaries who engaged in the impact bond project. This variable should be completed only when projects are sharing data at the project level.

number_with_positive_social_outcomes.title: Number with Positive social outcomes
number_with_positive_social_outcomes.description: Number of users or beneficiaries who engaged in the impact bond project and achieved positive outcomes. This variable should be completed only when projects are sharing data at the project level.

other_description_of_result.title: Other Description of result
other_description_of_result.description: A broader description of the results of the impact bond, if applicable.

outcomes_validator_organisation_ids.title: Outcomes validator(s)
outcomes_validator_organisation_ids.description: Name(s) of organization(s) responsible for validating the achievement of outcomes or otherwise assessing the metrics underpinning outcome payments. One outcome can have two or more validators.

evaluation_documents_source_ids.title: Evaluation Documents
evaluation_documents_source_ids.description: An evaluation is an objective assessment of a programme to determine whether and to what degree the intervention in an impact bond project has had an impact on the measured outcome variables over time. This variable provides a link to any published evaluations, if applicable.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about results.

ocid.title: OCID
ocid.description: Open Contracting unique identifier (OCID) of a procurement process associated with this impact bond project.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about procurement documents and OCIDs.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes on procurement documents and OCIDs.

grant_id.title: Grant ID
grant_id.description: 360Giving identifier that links this impact bond project with data on received grants.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about grants and 360Giving IDs.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of related document or case study.

url.title: URL
url.description: URL of related document or case study.

outcome_metric_id.title: Outcome Metric Id
outcome_metric_id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by the GO Lab team. This ID should be equal to the ID that was stated in the “Results” and “Outcome metrics” sections. These identifiers could be ‘outcomemetric1’, ‘outcomemetric2’, etc.

start_date.title: Start
start_date.description: Start date of claim period when service providers and/or investors can claim for outcome payments.

end_date.title: End
end_date.description: End date of claim period when service providers and/or investors can claim for outcome payments.

payer_organisation_id.title: Payer Organisation ID
payer_organisation_id.description: INDIGO unique ID of the organisation that is paying for outcomes (in most cases, this organisation will be the outcome funder/s listed in the ‘Outcome Payment Commitments’).

recipient_organisation_id.title: Recipient Organisation ID
recipient_organisation_id.description: INDIGO unique ID of organisation that is receiving payment for outcomes. Depending on the governance structure of the SIB, different organisations could be claiming for outcome payments. In some cases, the service providers have this role. In other cases, it is the social investor or even the organisation leading the SPV.

value.title: (Value)
value.description: Any outcome payment could be planned or actual. Planned outcome payments are those that have been forecasted by the outcome funder/payer during the design and structing of the impact bond. Actual outcome payments are effective transactions that occurred between the outcome funder and the claiming organisations in a fixed period.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which outcome payments are reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount of outcome payments received in this period in relevant currency.

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Amount of outcome payments received in this period in USD.

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Source of information about outcome payments.

id.title: Scenario Id
id.description: A within-project original, flexible identifier to be referenced in another sheet. This can be set by the GO Lab team. These identifiers could be ‘scenario1’, ‘scenario2’, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: Scenario name. These names could be ‘best-case scenario’, ‘medium-case scenario’, ‘worst-case scenario’, etc.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency in which maximum potential outcome payment is reported for this project.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Maximum potential outcome payment according to a particular scenario (e.g.: maximum potential outcome payment in the worst-case scenario).

amount_usd.title: Amount USD
amount_usd.description: Maximum potential outcome payment according to a particular scenario in USD (e.g.: maximum potential outcome payment in the worst-case scenario in USD).

source_ids.title: Sources
source_ids.description: Sources of information about the different scenarios.

value.title: (Value)
value.codelistDescription: A 2 character country code from ISO 3166. Eg: GB, US

value.title: (Value)
value.patternHint: Enter a date in format YYYY, YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD

value.title: (Value)
value.codelistDescription: A 2 character country code from ISO 3166. Eg: GB, US

value.title: (Value)
value.patternHint: Enter a date in format YYYY, YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD
